response.original_title: Rumors of War III: Target U.S.
response.overview: An invasion is underway. The shocking new documentary from GBTV, Rumors of War III: Target U.S. provides irrefutable evidence of the attack on the United States currently being perpetrated by the likes of the Muslim Brotherhood and Hezbollah. And, the scariest part? It's happening right before our eyes. Don't miss this exclusive documentary, get your copy today!
response.tagline: A powerful new documentary examines the infiltration of groups like Hezbollah and the Muslim Brotherhood in the United States.
response.title: Rumors of War III: Target U.S.
